name: Basic
description: Ideal for beginners or those who just want access to essential gym equipment.
features: Access to gym floor (all machines & weights)

name: Standard
description: Great for regular gym-goers looking for group classes and more flexibility.
features: Unlimited group fitness classes (yoga, HIIT, Zumba)

name: Premium
description: All-inclusive package with personal training, recovery services, and VIP perks.
